findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees and may abort with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Unaudited Dividend Tracker Modification
findings.description: The owner has the ability to change the dividend tracker without auditing, which may cause some functions to behave differently.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical parameters and access controls, potentially leading to unintended consequences.
